alert.note: Alert for Corson; Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 2:35AM MDT until May 12 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 AM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CORSON AND WESTERN DEWEY COUNTIES... At 235 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Little Moreau Rec Area, or 21 miles northeast of Eagle Butte, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Eagle Butte, Timber Lake, Firesteel, South Eagle Butte, Little Moreau Rec Area, White Horse, Green Grass, Laplant, Parade, Ridgeview, Tiospaye Topa School, Spring Lake, Glencross and Cheyenne River Reservation. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
